post.description: Create business, will recieve a new token
create event for full list of parameters check: https://developers.google.com/workspace/calendar/api/v3/reference/events/insert for parameters

put.description: update event, for full list of parameters check: https://developers.google.com/workspace/calendar/api/v3/reference/events/insert for parameters

post.description: create pipeline, stages field is optional

get.description: get pipelines by user id in token

put.description: Update pipelines stages optional in request
update user account details, if updating password the users current password must be provided

post.description: create user user. must enter the code from thier email

put.description: update user account details with verification code. user must enter the code from thier email

post.description: Send account recovery will return a token, email contains a code that the user needs to input for the next request
verify user email, token recieved must be used for create user request. for update email verification add query /users/verify-email?update=true

bearerAuth.name: Authorization
bearerAuth.description: Enter JWT token with **Bearer** prefix. Example: "Bearer {token}"
